title: "Launch" screen opens, but not the log in screen
body:
I am user of Mac OS X and when I try to open the game I click the LoL icon, then the update screen opens
and a sign of "Launch" on the upper part. I press the button and the game stops, it shuts down. Can someone help me with this issue. 
P.s. I play LoL on Windows through BootCamp(I use Windows mainly) and there is no such problem. 
I would gratefully appreciate any help. Thank you.

replies.body:
Generally, the patcher not appearing can be caused by security settings blocking it from launching.  The steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help fix that up.  

However, on a Mac the culprit might also be a connection issue failing to reach the patching service.  I also recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as well to rule out these possibilities and get the patcher up.  I hope that helps!
